name: Dicesnakes ?
description:
Dicesnakes ?

Collect more score than randomly moving other white dice while avoiding being caught by the red dice.

One player - just move around and collect as much as possible points, depending on which side you lan more points get generated.

One Hunter - destroys everything it comes in contact with.

Six enemies - get more score than all the enemies, each alive enemy gives generates 1 point.

Controlls: W/A/S/D or Arrow keys

Game entry for One Script Jam 2021

Credits:

Programming/models: Dragoons

Tools: Blender, Unity

Github
